tipss.text: Let customers know that photos and videos captured with Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses can be shared directly to Instagram, making it easy to post authentic, first-person moments without pulling out a phone.
It's worth mentioning that content captured on Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses can be shared to Facebook, helping customers quickly post life moments as they experience them.
Customers often love that moments captured with Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses can be enhanced using Edits, allowing them to polish clips before sharing without losing authenticity.
A great callout is how Edits helps turn everyday captures from Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses into clean, social-ready content with simple tools designed for quick refinement.
Highlight that hands-free capture makes it easier to create natural, in-the-moment content for Instagram Reels, especially when both hands are busy or movement matters.
It helps to explain that Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses support hands-free calling and messaging through WhatsApp, letting customers stay connected while keeping their phone in their pocket.
Customers appreciate knowing they can send and receive messages on Messenger using Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses, making it easy to stay responsive without breaking focus.
A simple mention goes a long way: Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses allow voice-based messaging across supported apps like WhatsApp and Messenger, all through discreet open-ear audio.
One standout benefit is staying connected on WhatsApp while remaining aware of surroundings, thanks to open-ear speakers that don't block out the real world.
It's useful to point out that content captured with Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses can be shared to Threads, making it easy to post quick updates as moments happen.
Customers often enjoy how hands-free capture supports spontaneous posting to Threads, helping them share thoughts or moments without slowing down.
Let customers know that Meta AI works directly with Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses, allowing them to ask questions, get help, or find information in real time.
A strong feature to highlight is how Meta AI can assist with translations, quick facts, and everyday questions... without needing to look at a screen.
Customers may not realize they can ask Meta AI for help while on the move, making everyday tasks feel smoother and more efficient.
One "wow" moment is demonstrating how Meta AI responds naturally through Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses, creating a more conversational, hands-free experience.
It's worth explaining that Meta Quest headsets connect users to shared social spaces inside Meta Horizon, where they can explore, play, and interact together.
A great moment to highlight is how Meta Quest headsets make it easy to meet friends or discover new experiences together inside Meta Horizon.
Customers appreciate knowing that Meta Horizon transforms VR from a solo experience into something social, interactive, and community-driven.
One key point to mention is that Meta Quest headsets allow users to jump into Meta Horizon quickly, without complicated setup or extra equipment.
A powerful takeaway is how Meta products work seamlessly with Meta apps, creating a connected experience from capturing moments to sharing, messaging, and social interaction.

Another win to share: Meta Quest Touch Plus controllers track fast, precise movements during gameplay.
Consider pointing out that Meta Quest accessories, like adjustable straps, can improve comfort during longer sessions.

It's helpful to note that Meta Quest headsets are designed for quick setup, so users can jump in within minutes.
